page.title: 17VILLAGE EVENTS
page.content:
Oxhill holds an annual{Flower Festival in St.Lawrences church when residents open their gardens to the public and serve teas.Money collected goes to the church and to charity.
Whatcote holds an annual{Garden Fete in the Old Rectory gardens,with stalls selling clothes and local produce. Entertainment is provided by childrens fancy dress parade,dancing by the Tysoe Tappers Childrens Group and Morris dancers from Oxhill.The money helps to maintain the village and church.
Idlicote Hill Farm holds an annual {Country Weekend}in aid of Leukeimia Research.Events include Tug of War, Minimarathon,stalls,flower arranging.
Oxhill/Whatcote hold{Harvest Suppers.
